resources.string: One of these animals must be launched into space. You decide which one.
This is a training exercise. No animals will be launched into space.

Cats - well known for their graceful poise, powerful night-vision, strong sense of self-worth and importance, and perhaps most importantly for their 9 lives! Who better to send into space than the lovable feline?
DOGS - They bark. Very loyal. Part of the family. see in black and white have 42 teeth run everywhere Are mostly ugly The Labrador Retriever has webbed toes on all four paws to assist swimming.

Join our campaign to send a hamster to space. We need your vote to help create a unique hamster habitat on other planets. Your vote to send a hamster to space has never before been so important for the survival of hamsters.

Think about it. Koalas are known for sleeping most of the day. They already spend all of their time in the top of the forest canopy - why not give this little buddy some more excitement and send him to the outer atmosphere?
But WAIT, there\'s more! Please share your thought on animals!
